Hi Sonia,

Kindly note that we have an existing Logistics Services Agreement for freight and delivery services in KSA, previously negotiated and executed between RTC and Aramex on 04/10/2022 (‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù). Considering the recent transition of warehousing and logistics functions from RTC to CGA, we can prepare an addendum to formally transfer the rights and obligations under the existing Agreement from RTC to CGA, along with any other necessary adjustments you may request to reflect the updated arrangement.

 

We look forward to your feedback.

Chalhoub Group accepts the attached all-inclusive rates, effective from 1st June 2025, with a minimum validity of 2 years.

 

We value our partnership and look forward to strengthening our collaboration, maintaining high service levels, and ensuring the satisfaction of our brands and customers. We recognize the importance of developing a strong partnership with our suppliers and are confident in our ability to achieve continuous successful outcomes together.

 

Please proceed with implementing the new rates and the 60 days payment term on the system for Chalhoub KSA account and kindly share the contract template in the coming days to initiate the legal discussion. Additionally, include the 3% TC discount on the main rate card and share the final fixed rates.

Once again, thank you for your interest in our project and for providing a compelling proposal. We are delighted to award your company and look forward to continuing our business with you.

 

Kind regards,

Sonia
